Christos Mantoulidis
Christos Mantoulidis

A geometric view on Brown--York mass

This talk is based on work with P. Miao and L.-F. Tam. We'll revisit Brown--York mass from a more geometric/variational perspective and relate it to ADM mass, Hawking mass, and the notion of boundary capacity.
